summary.span: 提供与 Windows 事件日志的交互。

span.span: Provides interaction with Windows event logs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可访问或自定义 Windows 事件日志，记录有关软件或硬件的重要事件的信息。 lets you access or customize Windows event logs, which record information about important software or hardware events. 使用，可以从现有的日志读取、 写入日志条目、 创建或删除事件源，删除日志，和响应的日志条目。Using , you can read from existing logs, write entries to logs, create or delete event sources, delete logs, and respond to log entries. 创建事件源时，还可以创建新的日志。You can also create new logs when creating an event source. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 除了提供对单个事件日志和它们的项，访问类允许您访问所有事件日志的集合。In addition to providing access to individual event logs and their entries, the class lets you access the collection of all event logs. 可以使用`static`的成员若要删除日志，获取日志列表、 创建或删除源，或确定计算机是否已包含一个特定的源。You can use the `static` members of to delete logs, get log lists, create or delete a source, or determine if a computer already contains a particular source. 有三个默认事件日志： 应用程序、 系统和安全。There are three default event logs: Application, System, and Security. 安全日志是只读的。A Security log is read-only. 其他应用程序和服务安装，如 Active Directory，可能有其他事件日志。Other applications and services you install, such as Active Directory, might have additional event logs. 使用的安全注意事项类。There are security considerations when using the class. 需要的.NET Framework 2.0 和更高版本中的特定操作或.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 中的完全信任权限。 requires permissions for specific actions in the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions, or full trust in the .NET Framework 1.0 and 1.1. 我们建议，不授予给部分受信任的代码。We recommend that not be granted to partially trusted code. 应永远不会传递事件日志的任何对象，包括和对象，不太受信任的代码。You should never pass any event log object, including and objects, to less trusted code. 例如，创建对象，写入条目，并将传递对象与部分受信任代码可以创建安全问题，因为能够读取和写入事件日志允许代码执行操作，例如颁发另一个应用程序的名称的事件日志消息。For example, creating an object, writing an entry, and then passing the object to partially trusted code can create a security issue, because the ability to read and write to the event log allows code to perform actions such as issuing event log messages in the name of another application. 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 确定的用户的凭据。Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the credentials of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要运行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的凭据从标准用户提升至管理员。To run the code that accesses the Security log, you must first elevate your credentials from standard user to administrator. 通过打开该应用程序的快捷菜单中启动应用程序时可以执行此操作 （如果您使用鼠标，右键单击应用程序图标） 并指示你想要以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by opening the shortcut menu for the application (if you're using a mouse, right-click the application icon) and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 可以使用若要创建自定义事件日志，您可以通过服务器的事件查看器。You can use to create custom event logs that you can view through the server's Event Viewer. 使用方法，以便在事件查看器中显示的事件日志的本地化的名称。Use the method to display a localized name for your event log in the Event Viewer. 使用方法时它达到其最大日志大小配置行为的事件日志。Use the method to configure the behavior of your event log when it reaches its maximum log size. 若要从事件日志中读取，指定日志名称 (属性) 和服务器计算机名称 (事件日志的属性。To read from an event log, specify the log name ( property) and server computer name ( property for the event log. 如果未指定服务器的计算机名，本地计算机"。"，则假定。If you don't specify the server computer name, the local computer, ".", is assumed. 不需要指定事件源 (属性)，因为源是仅需要写入日志。It's not necessary to specify the event source ( property), because a source is required only for writing to logs. 属性会自动填充的条目的事件日志的列表。The property is automatically populated with the event log's list of entries. 若要写入事件日志，请指定或创建事件源 (属性)。To write to an event log, specify or create an event source ( property). 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理凭据。You must have administrative credentials on the computer to create a new event source. 事件源将注册你的应用程序与事件日志的有效源的条目。The event source registers your application with the event log as a valid source of entries. 可以使用事件源写入一次只有一个日志。You can use the event source to write to only one log at a time. 属性可以是任何随机字符串，但该名称必须不同于计算机上的其他源。The property can be any random string, but the name must be distinct from other sources on the computer. 事件源通常是应用程序或另一个标识字符串的名称。The event source is typically the name of the application or another identifying string. 尝试创建重复值将引发异常。Trying to create a duplicate value throws an exception. 但是，单个事件日志可以与多个源相关联。However, a single event log can be associated with multiple sources. 如果与关联事件日志的事件源实例不存在，则创建新的事件源。If the event source for the event log associated with the instance doesn't exist, a new event source is created. 若要创建的事件源在 Windows Vista 及更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理凭据。To create an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative credentials. 此要求是因为必须搜索所有事件日志，包括安全日志，以确定事件源是否唯一。This requirement is because all event logs, including Security logs, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique. 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问该安全日志。因此，引发。Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the Security log; therefore, a is thrown. > [!IMPORTANT] > 创建或删除事件源需要使用已命名的互斥体的基础代码的同步。Creating or deleting an event source requires synchronization of the underlying code by using a named mutex. 如果高特权的应用程序锁定已命名的 mutex，尝试创建或删除事件源会导致应用程序停止响应，直到锁被释放。If a highly privileged application locks the named mutex, trying to create or delete an event source causes the application to stop responding until the lock is released. 若要帮助防止出现此问题，永远不会授予到不受信任代码的权限。To help prevent this problem, never grant permission to untrusted code. 此外，权限可能允许绕过其他权限，并仅应授予高度受信任的代码。In addition, permission potentially allows other permissions to be bypassed and should only be granted to highly trusted code. 应用程序和服务应编写应用程序日志或自定义日志。Applications and services should write to the Application log or to a custom log. 设备驱动程序应该写入系统日志。Device drivers should write to the System log. 如果未显式设置属性，默认为应用程序日志的事件日志。If you do not explicitly set the property, the event log defaults to the Application log. > [!NOTE] > 没有要保护应用程序免受编写为任何已注册的源内容。There is nothing to protect an application from writing as any registered source. 如果应用程序授予权限，它可以写入事件的任何有效的源计算机上注册。If an application is granted permission, it can write events for any valid source registered on the computer. 使用和方法将事件写入到事件日志。Use the and methods to write events to an event log. 必须指定事件源写入事件;必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统未常常刷新其事件源的列表，并且您尝试编写新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system hasn't refreshed its list of event sources, and you try to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以使用配置新的源对象或方法。You can configure a new source by using an object or the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理凭据。You must have administrative credentials on the computer to create a new event source. 每个源可以一次; 写入一个事件日志但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。Each source can write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，你的应用程序可能需要多个源配置为使用不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 若要更改现有源的配置详细信息，必须删除源，然后使用新的配置创建它。To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration. 如果其他应用程序或组件使用现有的源，请使用更新的配置，而不是删除现有源创建新的源。If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration instead of deleting the existing source. 为事件类别和消息字符串，可以使用本地化的资源注册事件源。You can register the event source with localized resources for your event category and message strings. 你的应用程序可以通过使用资源标识符而不指定实际的字符串值写入事件日志项。Your application can write event log entries by using resource identifiers instead of specifying the actual string values. 请参阅和有关的资源文件中配置你的源的详细信息的类。Refer to the and classes for more information about configuring your source with resource files. 如果你的应用程序直接将字符串值写入事件日志，您不需要设置源的文件属性的资源。If your application writes string values directly to the event log, you do not have to set the resource file properties for the source. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. 写入事件时，必须至少指定一个消息字符串或将消息字符串的资源标识符。When writing events, you must at least specify either a message string or the resource identifier for a message string. 其他事件属性是可选的。Other event properties are optional. 可选事件设置的示例包括：Examples of optional event settings include the following: - 可以设置以指定事件查看器显示的项的图标。You can set the to specify the icon that the Event Viewer displays for the entry. - 如果你的应用程序使用类别进行筛选事件，可以指定事件的类别标识符。You can specify a category identifier for the event, if your application uses categories for filtering the events. - 如果你想要将其他信息与给定的事件相关联，您可以将二进制数据附加到事件项。You can attach binary data to your event entry if you want to associate additional information with a given event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件日志记录占用磁盘空间、 处理器时间和其他系统资源。Event logging consumes disk space, processor time, and other system resources. 请务必只记录重要信息。It is important to log only essential information. 我们建议将事件日志的调用放在错误路径，而不是在主代码路径中，因此它们不性能产生负面影响。We recommend that you place event log calls in an error path, rather than in the main code path, so they don't adversely affect performance. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例创建事件源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将条目写入到事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the event source `MySource` if it doesn't already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. > [!NOTE] > 从 Windows Vista 开始，你必须以管理员身份运行此应用程序。Starting with Windows Vista, you must run this application as an administrator. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数设置属性设置为`logName`参数，属性设置为`machineName`参数，并且属性设置为`source`参数。This constructor sets the property to the `logName` parameter, the property to the `machineName` parameter, and the property to the `source` parameter. 属性是必需的写入事件日志时。The property is required when writing to an event log. 但是，如果您是仅从事件日志，仅读取和属性是必需的 （只要该服务器上的事件日志具有已与之关联的源）。However, if you are only reading from an event log, only the and properties are required (as long as the event log on the server has a source already associated with it). 如果你是仅从事件日志进行读取，另一个重载的构造函数可能就足够了。If you are only reading from the event log, another overload of the constructor might suffice. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`source` 参数。The `source` parameter.| ||`logName` 参数。The `logName` parameter.| ||`machineName` 参数。The `machineName` parameter.| ## Examples 下面的示例使用源""的本地计算机上将条目写入到事件日志中，"MyNewLog"。The following example writes an entry to an event log, "MyNewLog", on the local computer, using the source "MySource". summary.span: 从事件日志中移除所有项。

span.span: Removes all entries from the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件日志的设置确定它们可以包含多个条目的最大大小。Event logs are set with a maximum size that determines how many entries they can contain. 事件日志已满时，它将停止记录新事件信息，或开始覆盖以前的项。When an event log is full, it stops recording new event information or begins to overwrite earlier entries. 如果事件录制停止后，可以使用此方法以清除日志中的现有条目并允许它重新开始记录事件。If event recording stops, you can use this method to clear the log of existing entries and allow it to start recording events again. 必须具有对日志所在清除事件日志条目的计算机的管理员权限。You must have administrator permissions to the computer on which the log resides to clear event log entries. 关闭事件日志、 检索新读取和写入句柄，释放事件句柄，并重新打开事件日志。 closes the event log, releases the event handles, retrieves new read and write handles, and reopens the event log. 对方法的调用后收到的事件不会清除与现有事件。Events received after the call to the method are not cleared along with the existing events. ## Examples 以下示例清除事件日志。The following example clears an event log. > [!CAUTION] > 由于应用程序、 系统、 安全性和其他非自定义日志可能包含重要信息;请务必执行此示例代码之前指定自定义日志。Because Application, System, Security, and other non-custom logs can contain crucial information; be sure to specify a custom log before executing this example code. 此示例将删除自定义日志`myNewLog`。This example deletes the custom log `myNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.Clear Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Clear Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.Clear Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Clear Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.Clear Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Clear Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载用于配置新的本地计算机或远程计算机上写入事件日志条目源。Use this overload to configure a new source for writing entries to an event log on the local computer or a remote computer. 不需要使用此方法来读取事件日志。It is not necessary to use this method to read from an event log. 方法使用输入`sourceData` ，和属性，以在新的源和其关联的事件日志的目标计算机上创建注册表值。The method uses the input `sourceData`, and properties to create registry values on the target computer for the new source and its associated event log. 新的源名称不能与现有的源名称或目标计算机上的现有事件日志名称匹配。A new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name on the target computer. 如果属性未设置，为应用程序事件日志注册源。If the property is not set, the source is registered for the Application event log. 如果未设置，在本地计算机上注册了源。If the is not set, the source is registered on the local computer. > [!NOTE] > 若要创建的事件源在 Windows Vista 及更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理权限。To create an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges. > > 这一要求的原因是必须搜索所有事件日志，包括安全性，以确定事件源是否唯一。The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique. 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问该安全日志。因此，引发。Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a is thrown. > > 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 使用和将事件写入到事件日志。Use and to write events to an event log. 必须指定事件源写入事件;必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 可以创建现有事件日志或新的事件日志的事件源。You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log. 创建新的源为新的事件日志时，系统注册该日志的源，但直到第一个条目写入不创建该日志。When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 操作系统将事件日志存储为文件。The operating system stores event logs as files. 当你使用或若要创建新的事件日志，关联的文件存储在指定计算机上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目录。When you use or to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer. 通过追加的前 8 个字符设置的文件名称".evt"文件扩展名的属性。The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the property with the ".evt" file name extension. 每个源只能写入到事件日志中只有一个一次;但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。Each source can only write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，你的应用程序可能需要多个源配置为使用不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 为事件类别和消息字符串，可以使用本地化的资源文件注册事件源。You can register the event source with localized resource file(s) for your event category and message strings. 你的应用程序可以写入事件日志项使用资源标识符，而不指定实际的字符串。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers, rather than specifying the actual string. 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来查找并显示基于当前语言设置的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 可以注册一个单独的文件，有关事件类别、 消息和参数插入字符串，也可以注册相同的资源文件，所有三种类型的字符串。You can register a separate file for event categories, messages and parameter insertion strings, or you can register the same resource file for all three types of strings. 使用， ， ，和属性来配置要本地化的项写入事件日志的源。Use the , , , and properties to configure the source to write localized entries to the event log. 如果你的应用程序直接将字符串值写入事件日志，您不需要设置这些属性。If your application writes strings values directly to the event log, you do not need to set these properties. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. 若要更改现有源的配置详细信息，必须删除源，然后使用新的配置创建它。To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration. 如果其他应用程序或组件使用现有的源，请使用更新的配置，而无需删除现有源创建新的源。If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration rather than deleting the existing source. > [!NOTE] > 如果源配置为事件日志，并重新配置为另一个事件日志，必须重新启动计算机更改才能生效。If a source is configured for an event log, and you reconfigure it for another event log, you must restart the computer for the changes to take effect. ## Examples 下面的示例确定是否在事件源名为`SampleApplicationSource`在本地计算机上注册。The following example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件源不存在，该示例设置源的消息资源文件，并创建新的事件源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最后，该示例设置使用中的资源标识符值的事件日志的本地化的显示名称`DisplayNameMsgId`中的资源文件路径和`messageFile`。Finally, the example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 该示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. 具体而言，为事件日志的本地化名称定义了资源标识符为 5001。Specifically, resource identifier 5001 is defined for the localized name of the event log. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

span.span: This method can also create a new custom log on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载创建自定义日志或创建并注册向本地计算机上现有的日志。Use this overload to create a custom log or to create and register a to an existing log on the local computer. 如果`logName`是`null`或空字符串 ("") 时调用，日志将默认为应用程序日志。If `logName` is `null` or an empty string ("") when you call , the log defaults to the Application log. 如果在本地计算机上不存在该日志，系统创建自定义日志，并注册应用程序作为为该日志。If the log does not exist on the local computer, the system creates a custom log and registers your application as a for that log. > [!NOTE] > 若要创建的事件源在 Windows Vista 及更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理权限。To create an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges. > > 这一要求的原因是必须搜索所有事件日志，包括安全性，以确定事件源是否唯一。The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique. 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问该安全日志。因此，引发。Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a is thrown. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 只需创建事件源，如果将写入事件日志。You only need to create an event source if you are writing to the event log. 之前向事件日志写入条目，您必须注册事件源的事件日志作为有效的事件源。Before writing an entry to an event log, you must register the event source with the event log as a valid source of events. 写入日志条目时，系统会将以查找要在其中放置您的输入相应的日志。When you write a log entry, the system uses the to find the appropriate log in which to place your entry. 如果您正在读取事件日志，您可以指定，或和。If you are reading the event log, you can either specify the , or a and . > [!NOTE] > 您不需要指定如果要连接到本地计算机上的日志。You are not required to specify the if you are connecting to a log on the local computer. 如果未指定时从日志中读取，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify the when reading from a log, the local computer (".") is assumed. 使用和将事件写入到事件日志。Use and to write events to an event log. 必须指定事件源写入事件;必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 可以创建现有事件日志或新的事件日志的事件源。You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log. 创建新的源为新的事件日志时，系统注册该日志的源，但直到第一个条目写入不创建该日志。When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 操作系统将事件日志存储为文件。The operating system stores event logs as files. 当你使用或若要创建新的事件日志，关联的文件存储在指定计算机上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目录。When you use or to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer. 通过追加的前 8 个字符设置的文件名称".evt"文件扩展名的属性。The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the property with the ".evt" file name extension. 源必须是本地计算机; 上唯一新的源名称不能与现有的源名称或现有的事件日志名称匹配。The source must be unique on the local computer; a new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name. 每个源可以一次; 写入一个事件日志但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。Each source can write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，你的应用程序可能需要多个源配置为使用不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. 若要更改现有源的配置详细信息，必须删除源，然后使用新的配置创建它。To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration. 如果其他应用程序或组件使用现有的源，请使用更新的配置，而无需删除现有源创建新的源。If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration rather than deleting the existing source. > [!NOTE] > 如果源已映射到某个日志并重新映射到新的日志，必须重新启动计算机更改才能生效。If a source has already been mapped to a log and you remap it to a new log, you must restart the computer for the changes to take effect. ## Examples 下面的示例创建源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将条目写入到事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要删除的日志位于本地计算机上，请使用此方法。Use this method when the log you want to delete is on the local computer. 只要您具有相应的注册表权限，可以删除该计算机上的任何日志。You can delete any log on the computer, provided you have the appropriate registry permissions. 删除指定的日志`logName`从本地计算机。 removes the log specified by `logName` from the local computer. 如果你想要删除的源只能注册到一个日志，请调用。If you want to delete only the source registered to a log, call . 如果只想要删除的日志条目，则调用。If you only want to delete the log entries, call . 并是`static`方法，以便它们可以在类本身上调用。 and are `static` methods, so they can be called on the class itself. 不需要创建的新实例调用这两种方法。It is not necessary to create a new instance of to call either method. 方法首先删除保存日志的内容的文件。The method first deletes the file that holds the contents of the log. 然后，它访问注册表，并将删除为该日志注册的所有事件源。It then accesses the registry and removes all the event sources registered for that log. 如果重新创建在以后的日志，应注册事件源同样，若要重复使用。If you recreate the log at a later point, you should register the event sources again, if they are to be reused. 如果不注册事件源和其他用户写入的事件源而无需指定日志名称，将在应用程序事件日志中创建事件源。If you do not register the event sources and other users write to an event source without specifying a log name, the event source will be created in the Application event log. 因此，以前无法将条目写入到日志删除并重新创建的应用程序将向应用程序日志改为编写，因为它现在包含事件源。Therefore, applications that previously were able to write entries to the log you deleted and recreated will write to the Application log instead, because it now contains the event source. > [!NOTE] > 重新创建事件日志可以是一个困难的过程。Recreating an event log can be a difficult process. 避免删除任何系统创建的事件日志，如应用程序日志。Avoid deleting any of the system-created event logs, such as the Application log. 删除通过调用日志会自动删除已注册到该日志的源。Deleting a log through a call to automatically deletes the sources registered to that log. 这会使其他应用程序使用该日志不起作用。This can make other applications using that log inoperative. ## Examples 下面的示例从本地计算机中删除日志。The following example deletes a log from the local computer. 该示例确定从其源的日志。The example determines the log from its source. > [!NOTE] > 多个源可能会写入事件日志。More than one source might write to an event log. 在删除之前自定义日志，请确保不没有写入该日志的任何其他源。Before deleting a custom log, make sure there are no other sources writing to that log. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.DeleteEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.DeleteEventSource Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.DeleteEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.DeleteEventSource Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.DeleteEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.DeleteEventSource Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Examples 下面的示例从指定的计算机中删除日志。The following example deletes a log from the specified computer. 该示例确定从其源的日志。The example determines the log from its source. > [!NOTE] > 多个源可能会写入事件日志。More than one source might write to an event log. 在删除之前自定义日志，请确保不没有写入该日志的任何其他源。Before deleting a custom log, make sure there are no other sources writing to that log. summary.span: 从本地计算机的事件日志中移除事件源注册。

span.span: Removes the event source registration from the event log of the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于删除的注册从本地计算机。Use this method to remove the registration of a from the local computer. 访问本地计算机上的注册表，并删除应用程序作为有效的事件源的注册。 accesses the registry on the local computer and removes the registration of your application as a valid source of events. 如果您不再需要将条目写入该日志，可以为有效的事件源删除你的组件。You can remove your component as a valid source of events if you no longer need it to write entries to that log. 例如，如果您需要将组件从一个日志更改为另一个可能会执行此操作。For example, you might do this if you need to change your component from one log to another. 一个源一次只能注册到一个日志，因为更改日志需要删除当前注册。Because a source can only be registered to one log at a time, changing the log requires you to remove the current registration. 删除注册到一个日志源。 removes only the source registered to a log. 如果你想要删除日志本身，则调用。If you want to remove the log itself, call . 如果只想要删除的日志条目，则调用。If you only want to delete the log entries, call . 并是`static`方法，以便它们可以在类本身上调用。 and are `static` methods, so they can be called on the class itself. 不需要创建的实例调用这两种方法。It is not necessary to create an instance of to call either method. 删除通过调用日志会自动删除已注册到该日志的源。Deleting a log through a call to automatically deletes the sources registered to that log. 这会使其他应用程序使用该日志不起作用。This can make other applications using that log inoperative. > [!NOTE] > 如果源已映射到某个日志并重新映射到新的日志，必须重新启动计算机更改才能生效。If a source has already been mapped to a log and you remap it to a new log, you must restart the computer for the changes to take effect. ## Examples 下面的示例从本地计算机中删除源。The following example deletes a source from the local computer. 该示例确定从其源的日志，然后删除该日志。The example determines the log from its source, and then deletes the log. > [!NOTE] > 多个源可能会写入事件日志。More than one source might write to an event log. 在删除之前自定义日志，请确保不没有写入该日志的任何其他源。Before deleting a custom log, make sure there are no other sources writing to that log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否条目写入到日志时引发事件。The property determines whether the raises events when entries are written to the log. 当该属性是`true`，接收的组件事件将收到通知任何时间中指定的日志中写入一项属性。When the property is `true`, components that receive the event will receive notification any time an entry is written to the log that is specified in the property. 如果是`false`，会引发任何事件。If is `false`, no events are raised. > [!NOTE] > 仅当在本地计算机上写入条目时，可以接收事件通知。You can receive event notifications only when entries are written on the local computer. 不能接收在远程计算机上写入项的通知。You cannot receive notifications for entries written on remote computers. ## Examples 下面的示例处理事件。The following example handles an event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时从事件日志读取的成员。Use the member when reading from the event log. 因为该属性是只读的不能修改该条目或写入到日志使用。Because the property is read-only, you cannot modify an entry or write to the log using . 而应指定，并调用编写新的日志条目。Instead, specify a and call to write a new log entry. 可以使用若要计算的事件日志中的条目数，并查看每个集合中。You can use to count the number of entries in the event log, and view each in the collection. 使用已编制索引成员，才能检索特定项有关的信息，如， ， ，或。Use the indexed member to retrieve information about a specific entry, such as , , , or . 不需要指定仅从日志中读取。It is not necessary to specify a when only reading from a log. 可以仅指定名称和（服务器计算机名称） 属性实例。You can specify only the name and (server computer name) properties for the instance. 在任一情况下，成员会自动填充的项的事件日志的列表。In either case, the member is automatically populated with the event log's list of entries. 在此列表中读取各项，可以选择适当的项的索引。You can select the appropriate index for an item in this list to read individual entries. 读取和写入日志条目之间的重要区别是不需要显式调用读取的方法。An important distinction between reading and writing log entries is that it is not necessary to explicitly call a read method. 之后并指定，属性自动填充。After the and are specified, the property is automatically populated. 如果您更改的值或属性，属性重新读取它的下一个时间。If you change the value of the or property, the property is repopulated the next time you read it. > [!NOTE] > 您不需要指定如果要连接到日志。You are not required to specify the if you are connecting to a log. 如果未指定，本地计算机"。"，则假定。If you do not specify the , the local computer, ".", is assumed. ## Examples 下面的示例读取事件日志中，"MyNewLog"本地计算机上的条目。The following example reads entries in the event log, "MyNewLog", on the local computer. summary.span: 向本地计算机上的事件日志写入项时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an entry is written to an event log on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取事件通知，必须设置到`true`。To get event notifications, you must set to `true`. 只能在本地计算机上写入项时，才能接收事件通知。You can only receive event notifications when entries are written on the local computer. 不能接收在远程计算机上写入项的通知。You cannot receive notifications for entries written on remote computers. 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 只要发生此事件，直到您删除委托调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate. 使用委托中处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 系统响应仅当最后一个的写入事件至少六个秒之前发生。The system responds to only if the last write event occurred at least six seconds previously. 这意味着你将仅收到一个六秒钟的间隔内的事件通知，即使多个事件日志更改时发生。This implies you will only receive one event notification within a six-second interval, even if more than one event log change occurs. 如果插入调用之间的足够长的休眠间隔 （约 10 秒） ，您不太可能错过了活动。If you insert a sufficiently long sleep interval (around 10 seconds) between calls to , you are less likely to miss an event. 但是，如果更频繁地发生写入事件，您可能无法收到事件通知，直到下一个间隔。However, if write events occur more frequently, you might not recieve the event notification until the next interval. 通常情况下，错过的事件通知将不丢失，而延迟。Typically, missed event notifications are not lost, but delayed. ## Examples 下面的示例处理一个项写入事件。The following example handles an entry written event. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.EntryWritten Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.EntryWritten Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.EntryWritten Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.EntryWritten Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.EntryWritten Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.EntryWritten Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组对象是在本地计算机上的所有事件日志的快照时对调用进行。The array of objects is a snapshot of all event logs on the local computer when the call to is made. 这不是动态集合，因此它不反映删除或创建的实时日志。This is not a dynamic collection, so it does not reflect the deletion or creation of logs in real time. 你应验证数组中的日志存在之前读取或写入到它。You should verify that a log in the array exists before you read or write to it. 数组通常包括至少三个日志： 应用程序、 系统和安全。The array usually includes at least three logs: Application, System, and Security. 如果在本地计算机上创建自定义日志，它们将显示以及数组中。If you created custom logs on the local computer, they will appear in the array as well. 若要检索事件日志的列表，您必须具有相应的注册表权限。To retrieve the list of event logs, you must have the appropriate registry permissions. 这些权限是与调用所需的相同和。These permissions are identical to those required to call and . ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上定义的事件日志，并显示每个事件日志的配置详细信息。The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer, and displays configuration details for each event log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组对象是指定的计算机上的所有事件日志的快照`machineName`参数时对调用进行。The array of objects is a snapshot of all event logs on the computer specified by the `machineName` parameter when the call to is made. 这不是动态集合，因此它不反映删除或创建的实时日志。This is not a dynamic collection, so it does not reflect the deletion or creation of logs in real time. 你应验证数组中的日志存在之前读取或写入到它。You should verify that a log in the array exists before you read or write to it. 数组通常包括至少三个日志： 应用程序、 系统和安全。The array usually includes at least three logs: Application, System, and Security. 如果在指定计算机上创建自定义日志，它们将显示以及数组中。If you created custom logs on the specified computer, they will appear in the array as well. 是`static`方法，使其可以调用上类本身。 is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself. 不需要创建的实例对象，从而使对方法的调用。It is not necessary to create an instance of an object to make a call to the method. 若要检索事件日志的列表，您必须具有相应的注册表权限。To retrieve the list of event logs, you must have the appropriate registry permissions. 这些权限是与调用所需的相同和。These permissions are identical to those required to call and . ## Examples 下面的示例获取"myServer"的计算机上的一个日志列表。The following example gets a list of logs on the computer "myServer". 然后，它将输出的每个日志的名称。It then outputs the name of each log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，在服务器上存在三个日志文件： 应用程序、 系统和安全。Three log files exist by default on the server: Application, System, and Security. 应用程序和服务使用的应用程序日志文件。Applications and services use the Application log file. 设备驱动程序使用的系统日志文件。Device drivers use the System log file. 审核打开的系统就会安全日志中生成成功和失败审核事件。The system generates success and failure audit events in the Security log when auditing is turned on. 如果必须安装 Windows 服务器上的 Active Directory 等其他应用程序可能有其他默认日志文件。If you have other applications installed, like Active Directory on Windows servers, there might be other default log files. 此外，您可以创建自定义日志文件的本地或远程计算机上。In addition, you can create custom log files on a local or remote computer. 自定义日志可帮助组织您的项比您的组件将事件写入到默认应用程序日志时所允许的方式更详细的方式。Custom logs help organize your entries in a more detailed way than is allowed when your components write events to the default Application log. > [!NOTE] > 日志名称被限制为八个字符。Log names are limited to eight characters. 根据系统，MyLogSample1 和 MyLogSample2 是相同的日志。According to the system, MyLogSample1 and MyLogSample2 are the same log. 如果写入事件日志时，它没有足够可用于指定属性。If you write to an event log, it is not enough to specify the property. 必须将关联与事件日志资源以将其连接到的特定日志的属性。You must associate a property with your event log resource to connect it to a particular log. 不需要指定时仅从一个日志，但事件源中读取必须是与服务器的注册表中的事件日志资源相关联。It is not necessary to specify a when only reading from a log, but an event source must be associated with the event log resource in the server's registry. 可以仅指定名称和（服务器计算机名称） 从其读取。You can specify only the name and (server computer name) to read from it. > [!NOTE] > 您不需要指定如果要连接到日志。You are not required to specify the if you are connecting to a log. 如果未指定，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify the , the local computer (".") is assumed. 如果未指定属性，调用如果，则返回空字符串未显式设置 (通过设置属性，或通过构造函数)。If the property has not been specified, a call to returns an empty string if has not been explicitly set (by setting the property, or through the constructor). 如果已指定返回向其注册该源的日志的名称。If the has been specified, returns the name of the log to which that source was registered. 一个源一次只能注册到一个日志。A source can only be registered to one log at a time. 如果属性设置的实例，不能更改属性中的为该而无需更改的值或调用第一个。If the property was set for an instance of , you cannot change the property for that without changing the value of or calling first. 如果您更改属性后的属性已设置，编写一个日志条目将引发异常。If you change the property after the property has been set, writing a log entry throws an exception. 操作系统将事件日志存储为文件。The operating system stores event logs as files. 当你使用或若要创建新的事件日志，关联的文件存储在指定计算机上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目录。When you use or to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer. 通过追加的前 8 个字符设置的文件名称".evt"文件扩展名的属性。The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the property with the ".evt" file name extension. 无法创建新的日志使用属性单独 （不带指定的日志源）。You cannot create a new log using the property alone (without specifying a source for the log). 您可以调用中，传入新的日志名称作为参数，然后再调用。You can call , passing in a new log name as a parameter, and then call . 但是，其目的通常是以创建 （并将项写入） 新的特定于应用程序日志，或从现有的日志读取。However, the intent is usually either to create (and write entries to) new application-specific logs, or to read from existing logs. 如果值发生更改，关闭事件日志并释放所有的事件句柄。If the value changes, the event log is closed and all event handles are released. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您设置属性设置为不存在日志的名称，系统将附加到应用程序日志，但不会警告你它正在使用不是你指定的日志。If you set the property to the name of a log that does not exist, the system attaches the to the Application log, but does not warn you that it is using a log other than the one you specified. ## Examples 下面的示例读取事件日志中，"NewEventLog"本地计算机上的条目。The following example reads entries in the event log, "NewEventLog", on the local computer. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，用户没有访问安全日志的权限。In Windows Vista and later, users do not have permission to access the security log. 如果运行的 Windows Vista 或更高版本作为用户，将收到当你尝试访问安全日志中的事件的显示名称。If you are running Windows Vista or later as a user, you will get a when you attempt to access the display name for an event in the security log. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上定义的事件日志，并显示每个事件日志。The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer and displays the for each event log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件源指示什么来记录事件。The event source indicates what logs the event. 通常是应用程序的名称或子组件的应用程序的名称时应用程序非常大。It is often the name of the application, or the name of a subcomponent of the application, if the application is large. 应用程序和服务应写入应用程序日志或自定义日志。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 设备驱动程序应该写入系统日志。Device drivers should write to the System log. 当创建新的源，它可以只写入一个日志一次，系统将你的应用程序与事件日志注册为有效项源。When you create a new source, which can only write to one log at a time, the system registers your application with the event log as a valid source of entries. 属性可以是任意字符串，但名称不能由其他计算机上的源。The property can be any string, but the name cannot be used by other sources on the computer. 尝试创建重复值将引发异常。An attempt to create a duplicated value throws an exception. 但是，单个事件日志可以有多个不同源向其写入。However, a single event log can have many different sources writing to it. ## Examples 下面的示例从本地计算机中删除源。The following example deletes a source from the local computer. 该示例确定从其源的日志，然后删除该日志。The example determines the log from its source, and then deletes the log. > [!NOTE] > 多个源可能会写入事件日志。More than one source might write to an event log. 在删除之前自定义日志，请确保不没有写入该日志的任何其他源。Before deleting a custom log, make sure there are no other sources writing to that log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示的事件日志文件的大小限制。The property represents the size limit of the event log file. 当事件日志达到大小限制，已配置的值确定是否丢弃新条目，或是否新条目覆盖旧条目。When the event log reaches the size limit, the configured value determines whether new entries are discarded, or whether new entries overwrite older entries. > [!NOTE] > 此属性表示此实例所表示的事件日志的配置设置。This property represents a configuration setting for the event log represented by this instance. 当事件日志达到其最大大小时，此属性指定操作系统如何处理为事件日志注册的所有事件源都写入新条目。When the event log reaches its maximum size, this property specifies how the operating system handles new entries written by all event sources registered for the event log. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上定义的事件日志，并显示每个事件日志的配置详细信息。The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer, and displays configuration details for each event log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以检查事件日志的当前设置。Use the property to examine the current setting for an event log. 使用更改最小数目的事件日志中的每个条目必须保留的天数。Use to change the minimum number of days that each entry in the event log must be retained. 值取决于事件日志的已配置的溢出行为。The value depends on the configured overflow behavior of the event log. 如果事件日志的属性设置为，则值为 0。If the property for an event log is set to , then the value is 0. 如果事件日志的属性设置为，则值为-1。If the property for an event log is set to , then the value is -1. 如果事件日志的属性设置为，则值大于零，并表示数的事件日志已满时保留事件日志条目的天数。If the property for an event log is set to , then the value is greater than zero, and represents the number of days to retain event log entries when the event log is full. 事件日志达到其容量限制时，仅会发生溢出行为。The overflow behavior only occurs when an event log reaches its size limit. 时具有其设置为，并在事件日志达到其最大大小，然后新条目如果它们可以将为其保留时间超出的条目才写入段。When an has its set to , and the event log reaches its maximum size, then new entries are written only if they can replace entries whose age exceeds the period. 至少保留事件项适合定期存档事件日志时的不同而不同。Retaining event entries for a minimum period is appropriate when the event log is archived regularly. 否则，则可能会丢失新条目时在事件日志达到其限制。Otherwise, you risk losing new entries when the event log reaches its limit. 若要避免丢失事件的新信息，请设置根据特定的事件日志的存档计划事件的最小保留天数。To avoid losing new event information, set the minimum retention days for events based on your archive schedule for a particular event log. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上定义的事件日志，并显示每个事件日志的配置详细信息。The following example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer, and displays configuration details for each event log. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件日志的溢出行为指定要写入到日志已达到其最大文件大小的新条目时，会发生什么情况。The overflow behavior for an event log specifies what happens when new entries are to be written to a log that has reached its maximum file size. > [!NOTE] > 仅在事件日志达到其最大文件大小时生效的溢出行为。The overflow behavior takes effect only when an event log reaches its maximum file size. 溢出行为不会影响到可以容纳其他事件日志条目的日志写入新的条目。The overflow behavior does not affect writing a new entry to a log that can accommodate additional event log entries. 方法可配置事件日志的溢出行为。The method configures the overflow behavior of an event log. 实例。 instance. 调用此方法为指定的事件日志后属性，和属性值反映新配置的溢出行为。After calling this method for the event log specified by the property, the and property values reflect the newly configured overflow behavior. > [!NOTE] > 此属性表示此实例所表示的事件日志的配置设置。This property represents a configuration setting for the event log represented by this instance. 当事件日志达到其最大大小时，此属性指定操作系统如何处理为事件日志注册的所有事件源都写入新条目。When the event log reaches its maximum size, this property specifies how the operating system handles new entries written by all event sources registered for the event log. 设置`action`参数以指示新条目覆盖最旧条目时达到其最大大小。Set the `action` parameter to to indicate that a new entry overwrites the oldest entry when the reaches its maximum size. 如果`action`参数设置为，则`retentionDays`参数值将被忽略。If the `action` parameter is set to , the `retentionDays` parameter value is ignored. 设置`action`参数以指示每个新条目覆盖旧条目时达到其最大大小。Set the `action` parameter to to indicate that each new entry overwrites older entries when the reaches its maximum size. 指定在日志中使用的事件必须保留的天数`retentionDays`参数。Specify the number of days that events must be retained in the log using the `retentionDays` parameter. 新条目不会覆盖的保持期内写入的事件。Events written within the retention range are not overwritten by new entries. 设置`action`参数放弃新事件时已达到最大日志大小。Set the `action` parameter to to discard new events when the maximum log size is reached. 如果`action`参数设置为，则`retentionDays`参数值将被忽略。If the `action` parameter is set to , the `retentionDays` parameter value is ignored. > [!CAUTION] > 溢出策略设置为指定事件日志已满时，将丢弃新条目。Setting the overflow policy to specifies that new entries are discarded when the event log is full. 如果使用此设置，请确保事件日志是定期存档和清除避免达到其最大大小限制。If you use this setting, ensure the event log is regularly archived and cleared to avoid reaching its maximum size limit. ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用进行注册和自定义事件日志的事件查看器中显示的本地化的名称。Use to register and display a localized name in the Event Viewer for custom event logs. 指定的资源标识符必须对应于资源文件中定义的已本地化字符串。The specified resource identifier must correspond to a localized string defined in the resource file. 事件查看器显示使用本地化的字符串和当前区域性设置的自定义事件日志名称。The Event Viewer displays the custom event log name using the localized string and the current culture settings. 例如，可以定义多个资源文件中的不同区域性的本地化的事件日志名称。For example, you can define multiple event log names localized for different cultures in your resource file. 事件查看器显示与当前用户的区域性设置相对应的本地化的字符串。The Event Viewer displays the localized string corresponding to the culture settings of the current user. 如果在事件查看器无法从资源文件中，加载已本地化的字符串，或如果没有显示名称已注册的事件日志，事件查看器显示中定义的事件日志名称。If the Event Viewer cannot load the localized string from the resource file, or if no display name was registered for the event log, then the Event Viewer displays the event log name defined in . > [!NOTE] > 不需要注册预定义的事件日志的显示名称。You do not need to register a display name for the pre-defined event logs. 操作系统注册应用程序、 系统和安全事件日志的本地化的显示名称。The operating system registers the localized display names for the Application, System, and Security event logs. ## Examples 下面的示例确定是否在事件源名为`SampleApplicationSource`在本地计算机上注册。The following example determines whether the event source named `SampleApplicationSource` is registered on the local computer. 如果事件源不存在，该示例设置源的消息资源文件，并创建新的事件源。If the event source does not exist, the example sets the message resource file for the source and creates the new event source. 最后，该示例设置使用中的资源标识符值的事件日志的本地化的显示名称`DisplayNameMsgId`中的资源文件路径和`messageFile`。Finally, the example sets the localized display name for the event log, using the resource identifier value in `DisplayNameMsgId` and the resource file path in `messageFile`. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#6)] 该示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. 具体而言，为事件日志的本地化名称定义了资源标识符为 5001。Specifically, resource identifier 5001 is defined for the localized name of the event log. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

summary.span: 获取或设置在写入事件日志时要注册和使用的源名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the source name to register and use when writing to the event log.

value.span: 在事件日志中注册为项源的名称。

span.span: The name registered with the event log as a source of entries.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件源指示什么来记录事件。The event source indicates what logs the event. 通常是应用程序的名称或子组件的应用程序的名称时应用程序非常大。It is often the name of the application, or the name of a subcomponent of the application, if the application is large. 应用程序和服务应写入应用程序日志或自定义日志。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 设备驱动程序应该写入系统日志。Device drivers should write to the System log. 只需指定事件源，如果将写入事件日志。You only need to specify an event source if you are writing to an event log. 之前向事件日志写入条目，您必须注册事件源的事件日志作为有效的事件源。Before writing an entry to an event log, you must register the event source with the event log as a valid source of events. 写入日志条目时，系统会将属性来查找要在其中放置您的输入适当的日志。When you write a log entry, the system uses the property to find the appropriate log in which to place your entry. 如果您正在读取事件日志，您可以指定，或和。If you are reading the event log, you can either specify the , or a and . > [!NOTE] > 您不需要指定如果要连接到本地计算机上的日志。You are not required to specify the if you are connecting to a log on the local computer. 如果未指定，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify the , the local computer (".") is assumed. 使用和将事件写入到事件日志。Use and to write events to an event log. 必须指定事件源写入事件;必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 可以创建现有事件日志或新的事件日志的事件源。You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log. 创建新的源为新的事件日志时，系统注册该日志的源，但直到第一个条目写入不创建该日志。When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 源必须是本地计算机; 上唯一新的源名称不能与现有的源名称或现有的事件日志名称匹配。The source must be unique on the local computer; a new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name. 每个源可以一次; 写入一个事件日志但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。Each source can write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，你的应用程序可能需要多个源配置为使用不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 如果您更改值，为它注册已关闭并释放所有的事件句柄。If you change the value, the to which it is registered is closed and all event handles are released. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. 若要更改现有源的配置详细信息，必须删除源，然后使用新的配置创建它。To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration. 如果其他应用程序或组件使用现有的源，请使用更新的配置，而无需删除现有源创建新的源。If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration rather than deleting the existing source. > [!NOTE] > 如果源已映射到某个日志并重新映射到新的日志，必须重新启动计算机更改才能生效。If a source has already been mapped to a log and you remap it to a new log, you must restart the computer for the changes to take effect. ## Examples 下面的示例创建源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将条目写入到事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于确定本地计算机上是否存在的事件源。Use this method to determine whether an event source exists on the local computer. 如果想要确定日志是否存在于在本地计算机上，使用。If you want to determine whether a log exists on the local computer, use . 由于此方法访问注册表，您必须在本地计算机，则拥有相应的注册表权限否则为将引发。Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the local computer; otherwise, a will be thrown. > [!NOTE] > 若要搜索的事件源在 Windows Vista 及更高版本或 Windows Server 2003，必须具有管理权限。To search for an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges. > > 这一要求的原因是必须搜索所有事件日志，包括安全性，以确定事件源是否唯一。The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique. 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户没有权限访问该安全日志。因此，引发。Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a is thrown. > > 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. > [!NOTE] > 执行时使用的服务帐户没有执行此方法所需的权限。A service that is executing under the account does not have the privileges required to execute this method. 解决方法是检查中是否存在事件源，并且如果它不存在，在安装程序中创建源。The solution is to check whether the event source exists in the , and if it does not exist, to create the source in the installer. 由于不能为新的源提供的同一台计算机上的现有源名称，使用此方法尝试之前调用，确保源与指定的名称`source`本地计算机上尚不存在。Because you cannot give a new source the name of an existing source on the same computer, use this method before attempting to call to ensure that a source with the name specified by `source` does not already exist on the local computer. `source`参数不区分大小写。The `source` parameter is not case-sensitive. ## Examples 下面的示例创建源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将条目写入到事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.Source Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.Source Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

therefore, a is thrown. > > 从 Windows Vista 开始，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. > [!NOTE] > 执行时使用的服务帐户没有执行此方法所需的权限。A service that is executing under the account does not have the privileges required to execute this method. 解决方法是检查中是否存在事件源，并且如果它不存在，在安装程序中创建源。The solution is to check whether the event source exists in the , and if it does not exist, to create the source in the installer. 由于不能为新的源提供的同一台计算机上的现有源名称，使用此方法尝试之前调用，确保源与指定的名称`source`的计算机上尚不存在。Because you cannot give a new source the name of an existing source on the same computer, use this method before attempting to call to ensure that a source with the name specified by `source` does not already exist on the computer. `source`和`machineName`参数都不区分大小写。The `source` and `machineName` parameters are not case sensitive. 是`static`方法，使其可以调用类本身上。 is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself. 不需要创建的实例调用。It is not necessary to create an instance of to call . ## Examples 下面的示例创建源`MySource`的计算机上`MyServer`，并将条目写入到事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the source `MySource` on the computer `MyServer`, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.SourceExists1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是`null`，方法处理从系统线程池线程上调用事件。When is `null`, methods handling the event are called on a thread from the system thread pool. 系统线程池的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on system thread pools, see . 当事件由 visual Windows 窗体组件，如按钮，通过系统线程池访问组件可能无法工作，或可能会导致异常处理。When the event is handled by a visual Windows Forms component, such as a button, accessing the component through the system thread pool might not work, or might result in an exception. 通过设置来避免这到 Windows 窗体组件时，这将导致处理的方法在其创建该组件在同一线程上调用的事件。Avoid this by setting to a Windows Forms component, which causes the methods handling the event to be called on the same thread on which the component was created. 如果内部使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]在 Windows 窗体设计器中，自动设置为控件包含。If the is used inside [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] in a Windows Forms designer, is automatically set to the control containing the . 例如，如果将置于Form1 的设计器上 (派生自)属性的设置为 Form1 的实例。For example, if you place an on a designer for Form1 (which inherits from ) the property of is set to the instance of Form1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于向与此关联的事件日志写入信息条目实例。Use this method to write an information entry to the event log associated with this instance. 如果你想要指定任何其他，使用的不同重载。If you want to specify any other , use a different overload of . > [!NOTE] > `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是一个整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器将其视为插入字符串。The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string. Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址可以包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address. 必须设置上的属性在组件之前可以向日志写入条目。You must set the property on your component before you can write entries to the log. 必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 如果在指定的源属性的这写入你的组件，在计算机上不注册实例调用和注册源。If the source specified in the property of this instance is not registered on the computer that your component is writing to, calls and registers the source. > [!NOTE] > 如果未指定为你实例在调用之前或，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify a for your instance before you call or , the local computer (".") is assumed. 如果系统需要注册通过调用并不上设置属性在实例，默认为应用程序日志的日志。If the system needs to register the through a call to and the property has not been set on your instance, the log defaults to the Application log. > [!NOTE] > 上面列出的异常的许多都由错误的注册过程中引发。Many of the exceptions listed above are generated by errors raised during the process of registering the . 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 方法直接写入事件日志写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。The method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file. 使用方法来写入事件时使用的本地化的消息资源文件。Use the method to write events using a localized message resource file. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. > [!NOTE] > 如果远程计算机中写入一个条目，消息 （文本字符串） 的值可能不是预期如果远程计算机未运行.NET Framework。If you write an entry to a remote computer, the value of the message (the text string) might not be what you expect if the remote computer is not running the .NET Framework. > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`参数包含 NUL 字符，则在 NUL 字符处终止事件日志中的消息。If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character. ## Examples 下面的示例创建源`MySource`如果它尚不存在，并将条目写入到事件日志`MyNewLog`。The following example creates the source `MySource` if it does not already exist, and writes an entry to the event log `MyNewLog`. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLog.CreateEventSource Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来编写一个包含应用程序定义的项`eventID`到事件日志。Use this method to write an entry with an application-defined `eventID` to the event log. `eventID`与源一起唯一地标识一个事件。The `eventID` together with the source uniquely identify an event. 每个应用程序可以定义其自身带编号的事件以及它们映射到其中的描述字符串。Each application can define its own numbered events and the description strings to which they map. 事件查看器显示这些字符串值，以帮助用户了解发生的问题并建议要采取的操作。Event viewers display these string values to help the user understand what went wrong and suggest what actions to take. > [!NOTE] > `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是一个整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器将其视为插入字符串。The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string. Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址可以包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address. 除了事件标识符，还可以指定为写入到事件日志的事件。In addition to the event identifier, you can specify an for the event being written to the event log. `type`由一个图标和日志的事件查看器中的类型列中的文本指示。The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log. 此参数指示的事件类型是否为错误、 警告、 信息、 成功审核或失败审核。This parameter indicates whether the event type is error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit. 必须设置上的属性在组件之前可以向日志写入条目。You must set the property on your component before you can write entries to the log. 必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 如果在指定的源属性的这写入你的组件，在计算机上不注册实例调用和注册源。If the source specified in the property of this instance is not registered on the computer that your component is writing to, calls and registers the source. > [!NOTE] > 如果未指定为你实例在调用之前或，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify a for your instance before you call or , the local computer (".") is assumed. 如果系统需要注册通过调用并不上设置属性在实例，默认为应用程序日志的日志。If the system needs to register the through a call to and the property has not been set on your instance, the log defaults to the Application log. > [!NOTE] > 上面列出的许多异常都由错误的注册过程中引发。Many exceptions listed above are generated by errors raised during the process of registering the . 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 方法直接写入事件日志写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。The method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file. 使用方法来写入事件时使用的本地化的消息资源文件。Use the method to write events using a localized message resource file. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. > [!NOTE] > 如果远程计算机中写入一个条目，消息 （文本字符串） 的值可能不是预期如果远程计算机未运行.NET Framework。If you write an entry to a remote computer, the value of the message (the text string) might not be what you expect if the remote computer is not running the .NET Framework. > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`参数包含 NUL 字符，则在 NUL 字符处终止事件日志中的消息。If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character. ## Examples [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3/CPP/eventlog_writeentry_1_3.cpp#3)]
