span.span: Writes an error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit entry with the given message text to the event log, using the specified registered event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法的指定项写入到事件日志中，将源使用已注册为相应的日志的事件源。Use this method to write an entry of a specified to the event log, using a source already registered as an event source for the appropriate log. `type`由一个图标和日志的事件查看器中的类型列中的文本指示。The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log. > [!NOTE] > `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是一个整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器将其视为插入字符串。The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string. Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址可以包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address. 必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 方法直接写入事件日志写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。The method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file. 使用方法来写入事件时使用的本地化的消息资源文件。Use the method to write events using a localized message resource file. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`参数包含 NUL 字符，则在 NUL 字符处终止事件日志中的消息。If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character. ## Examples 下面的示例警告项写入事件日志中，"MyNewLog"本地计算机上。The following example writes a warning entry to an event log, "MyNewLog", on the local computer. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来编写一个包含应用程序定义的项`category`到事件日志。Use this method to write an entry with an application-defined `category` to the event log. 事件查看器使用的类别的事件源写入筛选器事件。The Event Viewer uses the category to filter events written by an event source. 事件查看器可以将类别显示为数字值，或者它可以作为资源标识符使用类别来显示本地化的类别字符串。The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string. > [!NOTE] > `category`参数应为正值。The `category` parameter should be a positive value. 负类别值显示为互为补充的正数值在事件查看器。Negative category values appear as a complementary positive number in the Event Viewer. 例如，– 10 显示为 65526，65535 为 – 1。For example, a –10 appears as 65,526, a –1 as 65,535. > [!NOTE] > `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是一个整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器将其视为插入字符串。The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string. Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址可以包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address. 若要在事件查看器中显示本地化的类别字符串，必须使用事件源的类别资源文件后，配置和设置`category`类别资源文件中的资源标识符。To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the `category` to a resource identifier in the category resource file. 如果事件源没有配置的类别资源文件，或指定`category`没有索引的字符串中的类别资源文件，则在事件查看器将显示该条目的数字型类别值。If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified `category` does not index a string in the category resource file, then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry. 配置类别资源文件，以及数量的资源文件中的类别字符串使用或类。Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the or the class. 除了类别，可以指定要写入到事件日志的事件的事件标识符。In addition to the category, you can specify an event identifier for the event being written to the event log. 事件标识符的事件源，以及唯一地标识一个事件。Event identifiers, along with the event source, uniquely identify an event. 每个应用程序可以定义其自身带编号的事件以及它们映射到其中的描述字符串。Each application can define its own numbered events and the description strings to which they map. 事件查看器显示这些字符串值，以帮助用户了解发生的问题并建议要采取的操作。Event viewers display these string values to help the user understand what went wrong and suggest what actions to take. 最后，可以指定为写入到事件日志的事件。Finally, you can specify an for the event being written to the event log. `type`由一个图标和日志的事件查看器中的类型列中的文本指示。The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log. 此参数指示的事件类型是否为错误、 警告、 信息、 成功审核或失败审核。This parameter indicates whether the application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using span.span: Writes an entry with the given message text and application-defined event identifier to the event log, using the specified registered event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来编写一个包含应用程序定义的项`eventID`到事件日志中，将源使用已注册为相应的日志的事件源。Use this method to write an entry with an application-defined `eventID` to the event log, using a source already registered as an event source for the appropriate log. `eventID`，以及源代码，唯一标识事件。The `eventID`, along with the source, uniquely identify an event. 每个应用程序可以定义其自身带编号的事件以及它们映射到其中的描述字符串。Each application can define its own numbered events and the description strings to which they map. 事件查看器呈现给用户以帮助用户了解发生的问题并建议要采取的操作这些字符串。Event viewers present these strings to the user to help the user understand what went wrong and suggest what actions to take. > [!NOTE] > `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是一个整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器将其视为插入字符串。The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string. Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址可以包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address. 除了事件标识符的此重载还允许您指定为写入到事件日志的事件。In addition to the event identifier, this overload of lets you specify an for the event being written to the event log. `type`由一个图标和日志的事件查看器中的类型列中的文本指示。The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log. 此参数指示的事件类型是否为错误、 警告、 信息、 成功审核或失败审核。This parameter indicates whether the event type is error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit. 必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 方法直接写入事件日志写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。The method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file. 使用方法来写入事件时使用的本地化的消息资源文件。Use the method to write events using a localized message resource file. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`参数包含 NUL 字符，则在 NUL 字符处终止事件日志中的消息。If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character. ## Examples [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEntry_4#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_WriteEntry_4/CPP/eventlog_writeentry_4.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEntry_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_WriteEntry_4/CS/eventlog_writeentry_4.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEntry_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_WriteEntry_4/VB/eventlog_writeentry_4.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载将应用程序定义特定于事件的数据写入事件日志。Use this overload to write application-defined event-specific data to the event log. 事件查看器不解释该数据。它仅采用组合的十六进制转义序列和文本格式显示原始数据。The Event Viewer does not interpret this data; it displays raw data only in a combined hexadecimal and text format. 请慎用特定于事件的数据，包括它仅当你确信将很有用的某个人可以解决此问题。Use event-specific data sparingly, including it only if you are sure it will be useful to someone debugging the problem. 特定于事件的数据还可用于存储应用程序可以处理独立于事件查看器的信息。You can also use event-specific data to store information the application can process independently of the Event Viewer. 例如，可以专门为您的活动，编写一个查看器或编写一个程序来扫描日志文件并创建报告，包括来自特定于事件的数据的信息。For example, you could write a viewer specifically for your events, or write a program that scans the logfile and creates reports that include information from the event-specific data. 除了二进制数据，还可以指定应用程序定义的类别和应用程序定义的事件标识符。In addition to the binary data, you can specify an application-defined category and an application-defined event identifier. 事件查看器使用的类别的事件源写入筛选器事件。The Event Viewer uses the category to filter events written by an event source. 事件查看器可以将类别显示为数字值，或者它可以作为资源标识符使用类别来显示本地化的类别字符串。The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string. > [!NOTE] > `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是一个整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器将其视为插入字符串。The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string. Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址可以包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address. > [!NOTE] > `category`参数应为正值。The `category` parameter should be a positive value. 负类别值显示为互为补充的正数值在事件查看器。Negative category values appear as a complementary positive number in the Event Viewer. 例如，– 10 显示为 65526，65535 为 – 1。For example, a –10 appears as 65,526, a –1 as 65,535. 若要在事件查看器中显示本地化的类别字符串，必须使用事件源的类别资源文件后，配置和设置`category`类别资源文件中的资源标识符。To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the `category` to a resource identifier in the category resource file. 如果事件源没有配置的类别资源文件，或指定`category`没有索引的字符串中的类别资源文件，则在事件查看器将显示该条目的数字型类别值。If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified `category` does not index a string in the category resource file, then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry. 配置类别资源文件，以及数量的资源文件中的类别字符串使用或类。Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the or the class. 事件标识符的事件源，以及唯一地标识一个事件。Event identifiers, along with the event source, uniquely identify an event. 每个应用程序可以定义其自身带编号的事件以及它们映射到其中的描述字符串。Each application can define its own numbered events and the description strings to which they map. 事件查看器显示这些字符串值，以帮助用户了解发生的问题并建议要采取的操作。Event viewers display these string values to help the user understand what went wrong and suggest what actions to take. 最后，可以指定为写入到事件日志的事件。Finally, you can specify an for the event being written to the event log. `type`由一个图标和日志的事件查看器中的类型列中的文本指示。The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log. 此参数指示的事件类型是否为错误、 警告、 信息、 成功审核或失败审核。This parameter indicates whether the event type is error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit. 必须设置上的属性在组件之前可以向日志写入条目。You must set the property on your component before you can write entries to the log. 必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 如果在指定的源属性的这写入你的组件，在计算机上不注册实例调用和注册源。If the source specified in the property of this instance is not registered on the computer that your component is writing to, calls and registers the source. > [!NOTE] > 如果未指定为你实例在调用之前或，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify a for your instance before you call or , the local computer (".") is assumed. 如果系统需要注册通过调用并不上设置属性在实例，默认为应用程序日志的日志。If the system needs to register the through a call to and the property has not been set on your instance, the log defaults to the Application log. > [!NOTE] > 上面列出的许多异常都由错误的注册过程中引发。Many exceptions listed above are generated by errors raised during the process of registering the . 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 方法直接写入事件日志写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。The method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file. 使用方法来写入事件时使用的本地化的消息资源文件。Use the method to write events using a localized message resource file. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. > [!NOTE] > 如果远程计算机中写入一个条目，消息 （文本字符串） 的值可能不是预期如果远程计算机未运行.NET Framework。If you write an entry to a remote computer, the value of the message (the text string) might not be what you expect if the remote computer is not running the .NET Framework. > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`参数包含 NUL 字符，则在 NUL 字符处终止事件日志中的消息。If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character. ## Examples Viewer for a log. 此参数指示的事件类型是否为错误、 警告、 信息、 成功审核或失败审核。This parameter indicates whether the event type is error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit. 必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 方法直接写入事件日志写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。The method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file. 使用方法来写入事件时使用的本地化的消息资源文件。Use the method to write events using a localized message resource file. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`参数包含 NUL 字符，则在 NUL 字符处终止事件日志中的消息。If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character. > > `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是一个整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器将其视为插入字符串。The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string. Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址可以包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address. ## Examples [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3/CPP/eventlog_writeentry_1_3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3/CS/eventlog_writeentry_1_3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3/VB/eventlog_writeentry_1_3.vb#1)]

summary.span: （使用指定的注册事件源）将一个包含给定消息文本、应用程序定义的事件标识符和应用程序定义的类别的项写入事件日志，并向消息追加二进制数据。

span.span: Writes an entry with the given message text, application-defined event identifier, and application-defined category to the event log (using the specified registered event source) and appends binary data to the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将应用程序定义特定于事件的数据写入事件日志中，使用已注册为相应的日志的事件源的源。Use this method to write application-defined event-specific data to the event log, using a source already registered as an event source for the appropriate log. 事件查看器不解释该数据。它仅采用组合的十六进制转义序列和文本格式显示原始数据。The Event Viewer does not interpret this data; it displays raw data only in a combined hexadecimal and text format. 使用特定于事件的数据很谨慎;仅当你确信将很有用，包括它。Use event-specific data sparingly; include it only if you are sure it will be useful. 特定于事件的数据还可用于存储应用程序可以处理独立于事件查看器的信息。You can also use event-specific data to store information the application can process independently of the Event Viewer. 例如，可以专门为您的活动，编写一个查看器或编写一个程序来扫描日志文件并创建报告，包括来自特定于事件的数据的信息。For example, you could write a viewer specifically for your events, or write a program that scans the logfile and creates reports that include information from the event-specific data. 除了二进制数据，还可以指定应用程序定义的类别和应用程序定义的事件标识符。In addition to the binary data, you can specify an application-defined category and an application-defined event identifier. 事件查看器使用的类别的事件源写入筛选器事件。The Event Viewer uses the category to filter events written by an event source. 事件查看器可以将类别显示为数字值，或者它可以作为资源标识符使用类别来显示本地化的类别字符串。The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string. > [!NOTE] > `category`参数应为正值。The `category` parameter should be a positive value. 负类别值显示为互为补充的正数值在事件查看器。Negative category values appear as a complementary positive number in the Event Viewer. 例如，– 10 将显示为 65526，65535 为 – 1。For example, a –10 will appear as 65,526, a –1 as 65,535. 若要在事件查看器中显示本地化的类别字符串，必须使用事件源的类别资源文件后，配置和设置`category`类别资源文件中的资源标识符。To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the `category` to a resource identifier in the category resource file. 如果事件源没有配置的类别资源文件，或指定`category`没有索引的字符串中的类别资源文件，则在事件查看器将显示该条目的数字型类别值。If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified `category` does not index a string in the category resource file, then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry. 配置类别资源文件，以及数量的资源文件中的类别字符串使用或类。Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the or the class. 事件标识符，与事件源，一起唯一地标识一个事件。Event identifiers, together with the event source, uniquely identify an event. 每个应用程序可以定义其自身带编号的事件以及它们映射到其中的描述字符串。Each application can define its own numbered events and the description strings to which they map. 事件查看器显示这些字符串值，以帮助用户了解发生的问题并建议要采取的操作。Event viewers display these string values to help the user understand what went wrong and suggest what actions to take. 最后，可以指定为写入到事件日志的事件。Finally, you can specify an for the event being written to the event log. `type`由一个图标和日志的事件查看器中的类型列中的文本指示。The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log. 此参数指示的事件类型是否为错误、 警告、 信息、 成功审核或失败审核。This parameter indicates whether the event type is error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit. 必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 方法直接写入事件日志写入给定的字符串; 它不使用可本地化的消息资源文件。The method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file. 使用方法来写入事件时使用的本地化的消息资源文件。Use the method to write events using a localized message resource file. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`参数包含 NUL 字符，则在 NUL 字符处终止事件日志中的消息。If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character. > > `message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是一个整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器将其视为插入字符串。The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string. Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址可以包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address. ## Examples [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3/CPP/eventlog_writeentry_1_3.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3/CS/eventlog_writeentry_1_3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLog_WriteEntry_1_3/VB/eventlog_writeentry_1_3.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法向事件日志写入本地化的项。Use this method to write a localized entry to the event log. 资源标识符而不是字符串值与指定的事件属性。You specify the event properties with resource identifiers rather than string values. 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来显示的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifiers to display the corresponding strings from the localized resource file for the . 编写使用资源标识符的事件之前，必须将源注册相应的资源文件。You must register the source with the corresponding resource file before you write events using resource identifiers. 输入`instance`实例指定的事件消息和属性。The input `instance` instance specifies the event message and properties. 设置的`instance`源消息资源文件中定义的消息的输入。Set the of the `instance` input for the defined message in the source message resource file. 可以选择性地设置并的`instance`输入来定义事件条目的类别和事件类型。You can optionally set the and of the `instance` input to define the category and event type of your event entry. 此外可以指定一个要插入到本地化的消息文本的独立于语言的字符串数组。You can also specify an array of language-independent strings to insert into the localized message text. 设置`values`到`null`如果事件消息不包含替换字符串的格式设置占位符。Set `values` to `null` if the event message does not contain formatting placeholders for replacement strings. 必须设置属性上的你组件之前使用。You must set the property on your component before using . 指定的源必须配置用于本地化的项写入事件日志中。源最小值必须具有一个用于定义消息资源文件。The specified source must be configured for writing localized entries to the log; the source must at minimum have a message resource file defined. 必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法如果你的应用程序将直接写入事件日志的字符串值。Use the method if your application writes string values directly to the event log. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. > [!NOTE] > 如果您向远程计算机的值写入条目`message`字符串可能不会与预期如果远程计算机未运行.NET Framework。If you write an entry to a remote computer, the value of the `message` string might not be what you expect if the remote computer is not running the .NET Framework. 此外，`message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是一个整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器将其视为插入字符串。Also, the `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string. Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址可以包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address. ## Examples 下面的示例将两个审核项写入事件日志`myNewLog`。The following example writes two audit entries to the event log `myNewLog`. 如果在本地计算机上不存在，该示例创建一个新的事件源和一个新的事件日志。The example creates a new event source and a new event log if they do not exist on the local computer. 事件消息文本被指定的资源文件中使用的资源标识符。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a resource file. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#7)] 该示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法向事件日志写入本地化的项与其他特定于事件的数据。Use this method to write a localized entry with additional event-specific data to the event log. 资源标识符而不是字符串值与指定的事件属性。You specify the event properties with resource identifiers rather than string values. 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来显示的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifiers to display the corresponding strings from the localized resource file for the . 编写使用资源标识符的事件之前，必须将源注册相应的资源文件。You must register the source with the corresponding resource file before you write events using resource identifiers. 输入`instance`实例指定的事件消息和属性。The input `instance` instance specifies the event message and properties. 设置的`instance`源消息资源文件中定义的消息的输入。Set the of the `instance` input for the defined message in the source message resource file. 可以选择性地设置并的`instance`输入来定义事件条目的类别和事件类型。You can optionally set the and of the `instance` input to define the category and event type of your event entry. 此外可以指定一个要插入到本地化的消息文本的独立于语言的字符串数组。You can also specify an array of language-independent strings to insert into the localized message text. 设置`values`到`null`如果事件消息不包含替换字符串的格式设置占位符。Set `values` to `null` if the event message does not contain formatting placeholders for replacement strings. 使用事件时需要为事件提供更多详细信息中指定的二进制数据。Specify binary data with an event when it is necessary to provide additional details for the event. 例如，使用`data`参数，以包括有关特定错误的信息。For example, use the `data` parameter to include information on a specific error. 事件查看器不会解释关联的事件数据中;它采用组合的十六进制转义序列和文本格式显示的数据。The Event Viewer does not interpret the associated event data; it displays the data in a combined hexadecimal and text format. 使用特定于事件的数据很谨慎;仅当你确信将很有用，包括它。Use event-specific data sparingly; include it only if you are sure it will be useful. 特定于事件的数据还可用于存储应用程序可以处理独立于事件查看器的信息。You can also use event-specific data to store information the application can process independently of the Event Viewer. 例如，可以专门为您的活动，编写一个查看器或编写一个程序来扫描事件日志并创建报告，包括来自特定于事件的数据的信息。For example, you could write a viewer specifically for your events, or write a program that scans the event log and creates reports that include information from the event-specific data. 必须设置属性上的你组件之前使用的组件之前。You must set the property on your component before component before using . 指定的源必须配置用于本地化的项写入事件日志中。源最小值必须具有一个用于定义消息资源文件。The specified source must be configured for writing localized entries to the log; the source must at minimum have a message resource file defined. 必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. > [!NOTE] > 如果未指定为你实例，然后才能调用，本地计算机 ("。") 假定。If you do not specify a for your instance before you call , the local computer (".") is assumed. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法如果你的应用程序将直接写入事件日志的字符串值。Use the method if your application writes string values directly to the event log. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. > [!NOTE] > 如果您向远程计算机的值写入条目`message`字符串可能不会与预期如果远程计算机未运行.NET Framework。If you write an entry to a remote computer, the value of the `message` string might not be what you expect if the remote computer is not running the .NET Framework. 此外，`message`字符串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是一个整数值 (例如，%1)，因为事件查看器将其视为插入字符串。Also, the `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string. Internet 协议版本 6 (IPv6) 地址可以包含此字符序列，因为无法记录事件消息包含 IPv6 地址。Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address. ## Examples 下面的示例将两个审核项写入事件日志`myNewLog`。The following example writes two audit entries to the event log `myNewLog`. 如果在本地计算机上不存在，该示例创建一个新的事件源和一个新的事件日志。The example creates a new event source and a new event log if they do not exist on the local computer. 事件消息文本被指定的资源文件中使用的资源标识符。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a resource file. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#7)] 该示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将使用已注册为相应的日志的事件源的源的事件日志写入本地化的项。Use this method to write a localized entry to the event log, using a source already registered as an event source for the appropriate log. 资源标识符而不是字符串值与指定的事件属性。You specify the event properties with resource identifiers rather than string values. 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来显示源的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifiers to display the corresponding strings from the localized resource file for the source. 编写使用资源标识符的事件之前，必须将源注册相应的资源文件。You must register the source with the corresponding resource file before you write events using resource identifiers. 输入`instance`实例指定的事件消息和属性。The input `instance` instance specifies the event message and properties. 设置的`instance`源消息资源文件中定义的消息的输入。Set the of the `instance` input for the defined message in the source message resource file. 可以选择性地设置并的`instance`输入来定义事件条目的类别和事件类型。You can optionally set the and of the `instance` input to define the category and event type of your event entry. 此外可以指定一个要插入到本地化的消息文本的独立于语言的字符串数组。You can also specify an array of language-independent strings to insert into the localized message text. 设置`values`到`null`如果事件消息不包含替换字符串的格式设置占位符。Set `values` to `null` if the event message does not contain formatting placeholders for replacement strings. 指定的源必须在使用之前注册为事件日志。The specified source must be registered for an event log before using . 指定的源必须配置用于本地化的项写入事件日志中。源最小值必须具有一个用于定义消息资源文件。The specified source must be configured for writing localized entries to the log; the source must at minimum have a message resource file defined. 必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法如果你的应用程序将直接写入事件日志的字符串值。Use the method if your application writes string values directly to the event log. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. ## Examples 下面的示例将信息性事件条目和警告事件条目写入到现有的事件日志。The following example writes an informational event entry and a warning event entry to an existing event log. 事件消息文本被指定的资源文件中使用的资源标识符。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a resource file. 该示例假定已为源中注册相应的资源文件。The example assumes the corresponding resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#8)] 该示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

span.span: Writes an event log entry with the given event data, message replacement strings, and associated binary data, and using the specified registered event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将包含其他特定于事件的数据的本地化的项写入事件日志中，使用已注册为相应的日志的事件源的源。Use this method to write a localized entry with additional event-specific data to the event log, using a source already registered as an event source for the appropriate log. 资源标识符而不是字符串值与指定的事件属性。You specify the event properties with resource identifiers rather than string values. 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来显示源的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifiers to display the corresponding strings from the localized resource file for the source. 编写使用资源标识符的事件之前，必须将源注册相应的资源文件。You must register the source with the corresponding resource file before you write events using resource identifiers. 输入`instance`实例指定的事件消息和属性。The input `instance` instance specifies the event message and properties. 设置的`instance`源消息资源文件中定义的消息的输入。Set the of the `instance` input for the defined message in the source message resource file. 可以选择性地设置并的`instance`输入来定义事件条目的类别和事件类型。You can optionally set the and of the `instance` input to define the category and event type of your event entry. 此外可以指定一个要插入到本地化的消息文本的独立于语言的字符串数组。You can also specify an array of language-independent strings to insert into the localized message text. 设置`values`到`null`如果事件消息不包含替换字符串的格式设置占位符。Set `values` to `null` if the event message does not contain formatting placeholders for replacement strings. 使用事件时需要为事件提供更多详细信息中指定的二进制数据。Specify binary data with an event when it is necessary to provide additional details for the event. 例如，使用`data`参数，以包括有关特定错误的信息。For example, use the `data` parameter to include information on a specific error. 事件查看器不会解释关联的事件数据中;它采用组合的十六进制转义序列和文本格式显示的数据。The Event Viewer does not interpret the associated event data; it displays the data in a combined hexadecimal and text format. 使用特定于事件的数据很谨慎;仅当你确信将很有用，包括它。Use event-specific data sparingly; include it only if you are sure it will be useful. 特定于事件的数据还可用于存储应用程序可以处理独立于事件查看器的信息。You can also use event-specific data to store information the application can process independently of the Event Viewer. 例如，可以专门为您的活动，编写一个查看器或编写一个程序来扫描事件日志并创建报告，包括来自特定于事件的数据的信息。For example, you could write a viewer specifically for your events, or write a program that scans the event log and creates reports that include information from the event-specific data. 指定的源必须在使用之前注册为事件日志。The specified source must be registered for an event log before using . 指定的源必须配置用于本地化的项写入事件日志中。源最小值必须具有一个用于定义消息资源文件。The specified source must be configured for writing localized entries to the log; the source must at minimum have a message resource file defined. 必须创建并写入与源的第一项之前配置的事件源。You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这允许操作系统以刷新其注册的事件源的列表和其配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration. 如果操作系统没有刷新其事件源的列表，并且尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 要写入本地化的项还是要直接写入字符串，必须配置源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法如果你的应用程序将直接写入事件日志的字符串值。Use the method if your application writes string values directly to the event log. 如果你的应用程序将使用资源标识符和字符串值的条目写入，则必须注册两个单独的源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 例如，配置一个源的资源文件，以及如何将该源中的方法来编写使用资源标识符添加到事件日志条目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 然后创建不同的源，而无需资源文件，并使用在该源方法将字符串直接写入事件日志使用的源。Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. ## Examples 下面的示例将信息性事件条目和警告事件条目写入到现有的事件日志。The following example writes an informational event entry and a warning event entry to an existing event log. 事件消息文本被指定的资源文件中使用的资源标识符。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a resource file. 该示例假定已为源中注册相应的资源文件。The example assumes the corresponding resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#8)] 该示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置的资源库 EventLogMsgs.dll。The example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```
